title: Update branding details, services list, and add a Contact Form for Nihal Plasters & Interior Contractors

requirements.text: Update all user-facing branding text and SEO metadata to use the company name “Nihal Plasters & Interior Contractors” (instead of “Nihal Plasters & Interior Works”) across all pages and shared layout components, while keeping the existing luxury black/gold theme and overall site structure.

quotes: Company Name: Nihal Plasters & Interior Contractors

acceptanceCriteria: Home/About/Services/Gallery/Contact page SEO titles/descriptions no longer contain “Interior Works”.
Header and Footer brand text/copyright use “Nihal Plasters & Interior Contractors”.
No broken routes or navigation labels after the rename.

requirements.text: Update the displayed business address, service area copy, and Google Maps embed on the Contact page and Footer to match: “Sattenapalli Road, Dharani Kota, Indian Gas Front, Amaravati, Andhra Pradesh, India”, and update service-area messaging to clearly state the business serves customers all over India.

quotes:
Shop Address:
Sattenapalli Road, Dharani Kota, Indian Gas Front, Amaravati, Andhra Pradesh, India

Service Area:
We provide interior contract services all over India and can take projects anywhere.

acceptanceCriteria: Contact page location text shows the new Amaravati address.
Footer location text shows the new Amaravati address.
The embedded Google Maps iframe points to the updated address (or a map view that clearly corresponds to Amaravati / the provided address).
Service area copy on Contact page and About page communicates “all over India” (not limited to specific cities).

requirements.text: Expand the services content and navigation to include the full requested offerings: PVC Ceiling, Gypsum Ceiling, POP Work, Wall Panels, False Ceiling, Interior Decoration, and Material Supply & Contract Work; ensure the Services page, Home services quick-links, and SEO descriptions reflect the expanded list.

quotes:
Services include:
- PVC Ceiling
- Gypsum Ceiling
- POP Work
- Wall Panels
- False Ceiling
- Interior Decoration
- Material Supply & Contract Work

acceptanceCriteria: Services page displays all requested services as individual entries with descriptions and benefit bullets in the same premium style as existing services.
Home page “Our Services” grid links correctly to the corresponding anchors for all services (including newly added ones).
Services page SEO title/description mention the updated/expanded services set (no missing major items like False Ceiling or Material Supply & Contract Work).

requirements.text: Add a luxury-styled Contact Form section on the Contact page that collects (at minimum) visitor name, phone, city, and message/requirements, validates required fields on the client, and on submit opens WhatsApp to +91 7523029086 with a prefilled, URL-encoded message containing the form details (no backend submission). Also align primary CTA labels across the site to include: “Get Free Quote”, “Call Contractor”, and “WhatsApp Now” where appropriate.

quotes: Add call-to-action buttons: “Get Free Quote”, “Call Contractor”, “WhatsApp Now”.

acceptanceCriteria: A visible Contact Form appears on the Contact page with luxury styling consistent with the site theme.
Submitting the form opens a WhatsApp chat to https://wa.me/917523029086 with a prefilled message that includes the entered fields.
Required fields are validated before opening WhatsApp (clear inline errors, no submission when invalid).
At least one prominent CTA uses the exact label “Call Contractor”, and WhatsApp CTAs use “WhatsApp Now” where they are primary actions (without removing existing phone/WhatsApp functionality).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not add backend form handling; keep the app functioning as a static business site with client-side actions (tel:, mailto:, wa.me, Google Maps embed).
Respect single-actor backend architecture; no new canisters/services.
nonGoals: Custom domain configuration or fixing domain validation issues.
Adding third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported).
Persisting form submissions to a database or sending emails via external providers.

required: Luxury cinematic interior ceiling hero banner image with warm gold lighting and dark ambience (hero-ceiling.dim_1920x1080.png)
